column4: Does anyone know how to blacklist a wireless AP? I keep connecting to an unprotected network when mine goes down and Id rather not...
NetworkManager only automatically connects to wireless networks that you've connected to in the past...  it keeps a list of networks that it thinks are OK to connect to
If you want to remove the unprotected network from that list, right-click the NetworkManager icon (the one near the clock that shows your wireless signal strength) and pick "edit wireless networks"
That did the trick :) many thanks
